question: Who acknowledged Dupleix as the Governor of the territory starting from the Krishna river to the Kanyakumarika?
explanation: Nasir Jang captured Muzaffar Jang with the help of the English. Then Dupleix saved Muzaffar Jang by killing Nasir Jang through conspiracy. After that Muzaffar Jang acknowledged Dupleix as the Governor of the territory starting from the Krishna river to the Kanyakumarika.
